title: Output Shaft - Inspection

body.body: Examine all gears, bearings and thrust washers for damage, distortion, chipped teeth and wear beyond the service limits. Replace all defective components and always use new snap rings, circlips, a new output shaft seal and a new output shaft main bearing to assemble the shaft.
